name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Electrical Engineer with 8 years of experience, I bring a robust set of skills in **AutoCAD**, **MicroStation**, and **Bentley** for precise design and modeling, primarily focused on high-voltage systems, grounding systems, bus design, and cable routing. My expertise includes substation design, relay coordination, and compliance with **IEEE** and **NESC** standards. Furthermore, I excel in project leadership, mentoring team members, and effective communication to ensure successful project delivery.
In addition to these core skills, I have a strong background in full-stack development, utilizing modern tech stacks such as **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. I have led the development of enterprise-grade solutions within healthcare and financial sectors, incorporating **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. My cloud proficiency with **Azure** and **AWS**, along with a solid understanding of microservices architecture and CI/CD automation, supports my ability to build integrated systems that meet strict compliance standards.
